short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect your attention away from distracting sites into what maters.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Redirector is a tool that will help you in using or time for the things you want to. 
It's meant to redirect you from time wasting websites with you barely noticing it's there.

At the current version, you can have a list of websites you want to redirect away from, and a list of websites that you want to be redirected to. 

One of those websites will be selected at random if you happen to find your way to the unwanted sites.

Say goodbye to distractions ðŸš«
